channel.title: GRU on Alma Andersson
channel.description: Recent content in GRU on Alma Andersson

item.title: 2025 Western States 100
item.description: 👋 Introduction At 5:00 a.m. PT on June 28th, 2025, 369 lucky runners will start the Western States 100, one of American ultrarunning’s most iconic races. The 100.2-mile (161 km) course winds from Olympic Valley, near Palisades Tahoe, to a high school track in Auburn, California. The race has made legends — and broken hearts. Entry comes via a lottery system or a coveted “Golden Ticket” that has to be won from fiercely competitive qualifiers.
